data.lyric:
[ti:Oops]
[ar:Little Mix/Charlie Puth]
[al:Glory Days (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Oops - Little Mix/Charlie Puth (查理·普斯)
[00:03.35]Lyrics by：Charles Puth/Michael Caren/Jacob Luttrell
[00:06.70]Composed by：Charles Puth/Michael Caren/Jacob Luttrell
[00:10.06]Oops my baby you woke up in my bed
[00:14.61]Oops we broke up we're better off as friends
[00:18.59]Now I accidentally need you I don't know what to do
[00:23.78]Oops baby I love you
[00:26.93]It started with what's up with you
[00:29.53]I messed around and got caught up with you
[00:35.48]Yeah yeah I don't know what to do
[00:40.02]I caught these feelings like there's nothing new
[00:42.93]Now I can't get enough of you oh
[00:46.88]And when I think about the way you touch my body
[00:51.29]I don't know how long I can wait
[00:54.63]Ahhhh
[00:56.02]And when I think about the way you touch my body
[01:00.46]This could be my greatest mistake
[01:03.55]You've got me singing
[01:04.88]Oops my baby you woke up in my bed
[01:09.47]Oops we broke up we're better off as friends
[01:13.55]Now I accidentally need you I don't know what to do
[01:17.32]Do ooh
[01:18.60]Oops baby I love you
[01:22.27]We had a good run
[01:25.71]We messed around and had some good good fun
[01:30.35]Guess it turns out I lost a good one oooh
[01:34.30]'Cause now I'm wishing every morning would come
[01:38.25]With you next to me baby
[01:40.91]Oh yeah
[01:41.89]And when I think about the way you touch my body
[01:46.02]This could be my greatest mistake
[01:49.27]You've got me singing
[01:50.65]Oops my baby you woke up in my bed
[01:55.22]Oops we broke up we're better off as friends
[01:59.11]Now I accidentally need you I don't know what to do
[02:04.26]Oops baby I love you
[02:08.08]Ooh I I love you ooh ooh ooh
[02:17.53]Now I accidentally know that you're in love with me too
[02:22.60]Oops baby I love you yeah yeah yeah
[02:27.32]If it was up to me I would take a time machine
[02:31.80]To the day I said goodbye I lied
[02:35.40]Oh I lied so can we try again
[02:38.47]Ohhh
[02:38.67]Beneficial more than friends
[02:41.18]No don't you tell me goodbye
[02:44.04]You've got me singing
[02:45.48]Oops my baby you
[02:47.64]Yeah yeah yeah yeah woke up in my bed
[02:50.06]Oops we broke up we're better off as friends
[02:54.04]Now I accidentally need you I don't know what to do
[02:59.12]Oops baby I love you
[03:01.88]I love I love I love you
[03:03.77]Oops I love you ooh ooh ooh
[03:06.36]Oh I still love you yeah
[03:08.92]Oops I love you
[03:10.09]Yeah yeah
[03:12.30]Now I accidentally know that you're in love with me too
[03:17.48]Oops baby I love you
data.trans:
[ti:Oops]
[ar:Little Mix/Charlie Puth]
[al:Glory Days (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.35]//
[00:06.70]//
[00:10.06]哎哟 亲爱的你在我的床上醒来
[00:14.61]哎哟 我们早已分手 而我们之间却像好朋友
[00:18.59]如今出乎意料我需要你 我不知道该怎么办
[00:23.78]哎哟 宝贝我爱你
[00:26.93]爱意萌发 你怎么了？
[00:29.53]狼狈的我如今陷入对你的爱恋
[00:35.48]是啊 我已手足无措
[00:40.02]这种感觉在我心底蔓延已不足为奇
[00:42.93]如今 我对你的渴望怎么也觉不够
[00:46.88]当我想起你爱抚我的身体
[00:51.29]我不知我还能等多久
[00:54.63]//
[00:56.02]当我想起你爱抚我的身体
[01:00.46]或许这是我犯过最棒的错
[01:03.55]你让我不禁轻声唱起
[01:04.88]哎哟 亲爱的你在我的床上醒来
[01:09.47]哎哟 我们早已分手 而我们之间却像好朋友
[01:13.55]如今出乎意料我需要你 我不知道该怎么办
[01:17.32]//
[01:18.60]哎哟 宝贝我爱你
[01:22.27]我们曾有过美好过往
[01:25.71]我们曾狼狈收场 也曾拥有过难忘美好
[01:30.35]我想事实证明 我错过了我的唯一
[01:34.30]因为此刻 我只愿
[01:38.25]每一天清晨在你身旁醒来
[01:40.91]//
[01:41.89]当我想起你爱抚我的身体
[01:46.02]或许这是我犯过最棒的错
[01:49.27]你让我不禁轻声唱起
[01:50.65]哎哟 亲爱的你在我的床上醒来
[01:55.22]哎哟 我们早已分手 而我们之间却像好朋友
[01:59.11]如今出乎意料我需要你 我不知道该怎么办
[02:04.26]哎哟 宝贝我爱你
[02:08.08]我爱你
[02:17.53]不经意间 我也明白原来你也爱我
[02:22.60]哎哟 宝贝我爱你
[02:27.32]如果一切由我决定
[02:31.80]我愿搭乘时光机重回我们分手的那一天
[02:35.40]我撒谎 我们就能重新开始
[02:38.47]//
[02:38.67]我们亲密过所谓的朋友
[02:41.18]不 请不要跟我说再见
[02:44.04]你让我不禁轻声唱起
[02:45.48]哎哟 亲爱的你
[02:47.64]在我的床上醒来
[02:50.06]哎哟 我们早已分手 而我们之间却像好朋友
[02:54.04]如今出乎意料我需要你 我不知道该怎么办
[02:59.12]哎哟 宝贝我爱你
[03:01.88]我爱你
[03:03.77]我爱你
[03:06.36]我依然爱你
[03:08.92]哎哟 宝贝我爱你
[03:10.09]//
[03:12.30]不经意间 我也明白原来你也爱我
[03:17.48]哎哟 宝贝我爱你
